file_insights.significance: Establishes Python package structure for database seeds module
file_insights.details: Empty __init__.py file marks the seeds directory as a Python package, enabling imports from this module

patterns_discovered.description: Creating empty __init__.py files to establish package boundaries in Python projects
Establishing dedicated seeds directory at backend/app/db/seeds/ for database initialization scripts

patterns_discovered.pattern: Automated task tracking with auto-claude prefix
patterns_discovered.description: Using 'auto-claude: subtask-id' prefix in commit messages for automated task management

gotchas_discovered.description: Relying on empty __init__.py files to establish packages works in Python 3.3+, but may have different behavior in older Python versions with namespace packages
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Verify Python version requirements for the project

gotchas_discovered.description: Directory structure created but no actual seed files or implementations are present, leaving the module non-functional
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Follow-up tasks should add actual seed files and initialization logic

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully created the foundational directory structure for database seeds
approach_outcome.notes: First and only attempt succeeded. Created the seeds package directory with proper Python package structure using __init__.py

recommendations.recommendation: Implement seed files and data loading logic
recommendations.rationale: Current structure is a shell; needs actual seed data and initialization functions to be functional

recommendations.recommendation: Add documentation or README for the seeds module
recommendations.rationale: Document seed file naming conventions, expected structure, and how to run seeds

recommendations.recommendation: Consider adding seed runner script or management command
recommendations.rationale: Establish a clear mechanism for developers to run database seeds during setup

recommendations.recommendation: Add .gitkeep or sample seed file if directory might otherwise be empty
recommendations.rationale: Ensures directory is tracked by git even when empty, though __init__.py achieves this
